#place in app.py
from url_helpers import URLHelpers

# Create an instance of the URLHelpers class
url_helpers = URLHelpers()

# Generate a file path using the url_for method
static_folder = 'images'
filename = 'example.jpg'
file_path = url_helpers.url_for(static_folder, filename, width=800, height=600)

# Print the generated file path
print(file_path)
